mapper.select: select edu_school , edu_major , edu_degree , edu_gpa , to_char(edu_startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') edu_startdate , to_char(edu_enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') edu_enddate from education where edu_userid = #{id} order by edu_startdate

select career_org, career_dept, to_char(career_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') career_startdate, to_char(career_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd')career_enddate, career_title from career where career_userid = #{id} order by career_startdate
